name: tngip
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: syl5eq(c2, cfv(cip, c3), cfv(cip, c4), wcel(c0, c1))

body.origin:

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, cfv(cip, c3)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cip, c4))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cip, c4), cfv(cip, c3)))

comment: The inner product operation of a structure augmented with a norm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
